description: Detects the execution of the PUA/Recon tool Seatbelt via PE information of command line parameters
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: PUA - Seatbelt Execution
query: ((((process.executable.text:"*\\Seatbelt.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"Seatbelt.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.Description:"Seatbelt") OR (process.command_line.text:("*\ DpapiMasterKeys*" OR "*\ InterestingProcesses*" OR "*\ InterestingFiles*" OR "*\ CertificateThumbprints*" OR "*\ ChromiumBookmarks*" OR "*\ ChromiumHistory*" OR "*\ ChromiumPresence*" OR "*\ CloudCredentials*" OR "*\ CredEnum*" OR "*\ CredGuard*" OR "*\ FirefoxHistory*" OR "*\ ProcessCreationEvents*")))) OR ((process.command_line.text:("*\ \-group\=misc*" OR "*\ \-group\=remote*" OR "*\ \-group\=chromium*" OR "*\ \-group\=slack*" OR "*\ \-group\=system*" OR "*\ \-group\=user*" OR "*\ \-group\=all*") AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \-outputfile\=*")))
